briefdescription.para: Adds a page to the container.

simplesect.para: All pages must have the same width and height.

briefdescription.para: Defines the event handler interface for ClickEvents.

detaileddescription.para: The default implementation ignores the event. The event is only received if the Drawable is touchable and visible.

parameterdescription.para: The ClickEvent received from the HAL.

briefdescription.para: Defines the event handler interface for DragEvents.

detaileddescription.para: The default implementation ignores the event. The event is only received if the drawable is touchable and visible.

parameterdescription.para: The DragEvent received from the HAL.

briefdescription.para: Defines the event handler interface for GestureEvents.

detaileddescription.para: The default implementation ignores the event. The event is only received if the Drawable is touchable and visible.

parameterdescription.para: The GestureEvent received from the HAL.

briefdescription.para: Called periodically by the framework if the Drawable instance has subscribed to timer ticks.
Removes the page from the container.

simplesect.para: This is safe to call even if page is not a page (in which case nothing happens).

briefdescription.para: When dragging either one of the end pages a part of the background will become visible until the user stop dragging and the end page swipes back to its position.

detaileddescription.para: The width of this area is set by this method.

briefdescription.para: Sets the bitmaps that are used by the page indicator.

detaileddescription.para: The bitmap for the normal page is repeated side-by-side and the bitmap for a highlighted page is put in the proper position.

briefdescription.para: Sets the x and y position of the page indicator.
Sets the x and y position of the page indicator.

detaileddescription.para: The value specified as x will be the center coordinate of the page indicators.

simplesect.para: This method should not be used until all pages have been added, the setPageIndicatorBitmaps() has been called and the page indicator therefore has the correct width.

parameterdescription.para: Zero-based index of the page. Range from 0 to numberOfPages-1.

briefdescription.para: Set the swipe cutoff which indicates how far you should drag a page before it results in a page change.
A SwipeContainer is a Container with a horizontally laid out list of identically sized Drawables.

detaileddescription.para: The bottom of the SwipeContainer shows a page indicator to indicate the position in the horizontal list of items in the SwipeContainer.
